title: must fail to import definition file
specs: contains field ChangeOrganisationRequest defined twice within one casetype

provides a clear validation message describing why the definition import has failed, for example, Change Organisation Request is defined more than once for case type 'CaseTypeID' in worksheet [TabName]

body.__plainTextValue__: Validation errors occurred importing the spreadsheet.- Change Organisation Request is defined more than once for case type 'FT_ComplexOrganisation' in worksheet 'CaseField'
